"The Specter of Tragedy":
"We're once again detecting [Persona]
readings from the altered space.
Its obsessive desire to destroy the entire
universe brings it back again and again.
This battle will be extremely dangerous,
so we're only sending in ARKS who've
proven they're the best of the best.
――――――――――――――――――――
Max Damage Cap: 999999
Failure: Fail objective, time limit expires"

"The operation begins here.
Our objective is to re-enter
the altered space and destroy
Dark Falz Persona once again."

"It aims to destroy the entire universe.
Don't get complacent - when the fight
seems like it's almost over, that's
when it'll be at its most dangerous!"

"Give it everything you've got!
Destroy this thing for good...
And come back safely afterwards!"
